resources.string: This assistant will guide you through the process of connecting to a PiTest device.
Please verify that the host is activated, it\'s connected to the network and correctly configured for the remote access.
The port can not be a negative number.
The port parameter can not be empty.
The hostname parameter can not be empty.
The connection has been refuse by the host.
The hostname and port combination entered is invalid.
The connection to the host failed.
Execute a command on the host
List all scripts available on the host
List all commands available on the host
